Text:
This probably won't be cross posted to eztv due to their new policy of not allowing both Xvid and 720p editions. They only want one edition.

Here's the Xvid edition at Demonoid:
www[dot]demonoid[dot]me/files/details/2550982

A big cheers to you Mr Brush for yet another excellent upload !  
All good thoughtful TV as a perfect antidote to the usual Hollywood type dross so often clogging up the data streams.
BasilBrush for President !!!
